parallel.distributed

Class DLock

  • java.lang.Object
    • parallel.distributed.DLock

  • public class DLock
extends java.lang.Object
    implements a distributed lock, valid across JVMs and across multiple threads in each JVM. Within a JVM, only a single lock can exist for each <host,lockport(,unlockport)> pair.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String _host 
      private Lock _localLock 
      private int _lockport 
      private static java.util.HashMap _locks 
      private int _unlockport 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private DLock()
      no-arg constructor assumes host is localhost, and lock/unlockport is 7892/7893.
      private DLock(java.lang.String host, int lockport, int unlockport)
      constructor allows client to specify (host,lockport,unlockport) pair for distributed-lock server location.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static DLock getInstance()
      get the unique DLock object associated with the default <host,lockport,unlockport> pair, <localhost,7892,7893>.
      static DLock getInstance(java.lang.String host, int lockport, int unlockport)
      get the unique DLock object associated with the specific <host,lockport,unlockport> pair.
      void getLock()
      get a valid lock for all threads in this JVM, and all others that will execute this method that are connected on the same lock server/ports.
      boolean getLockIfAvailable()
      get a valid lock for all threads in this JVM, and all others that will execute this method that are connected on the same lock server/ports, but ONLY IF the lock can be immediately obtained.
      void releaseLock()
      release the lock across all JVMs asking for a lock for the particular <host,port> pair that this lock is associated with.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • getLock

        public void getLock()
             throws ParallelException
        get a valid lock for all threads in this JVM, and all others that will execute this method that are connected on the same lock server/ports.
        Throws:
        ParallelException

      • getLockIfAvailable

        public boolean getLockIfAvailable()
                           throws ParallelException
        get a valid lock for all threads in this JVM, and all others that will execute this method that are connected on the same lock server/ports, but ONLY IF the lock can be immediately obtained. Method returns immediately as it sends the request to the lock-server in the unlockport which is for non-blocking requests.
        Throws:
        ParallelException

      • releaseLock

        public void releaseLock()
                 throws ParallelException
        release the lock across all JVMs asking for a lock for the particular <host,port> pair that this lock is associated with.
        Throws:
        ParallelException
